name: The EPIC adventures of Skeletrox
description:
In this wonderful game <stop exagerating>, you will play as Skeletrox <what a dumb name>.

Skeletrox has lost his memory  after a huge fight against humans. He was helped by a human family and became accepted by all the humans. <soooooo cliche come on>

He definitely turned his back on his original master : the necromancer. He was ready to live a peaceful life, but the necromancer planned an attack on his family's village, and he couldn't let this happen...

This is why he decides to handle things himself by going in the necromancer's dungeon to defeat him himself ! <Yeah just like if a dumb minion could defeat his mighty master, I hate these dumb scenarios>

<Wouldn't you have more interesting things to do ?>
